sourceMeaningMnemonic: By showing the <radical>roof</radical> of your <radical>top hat</radical> you send your <kanji>best regards</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Giving your best regards is basically just tipping your hat and showing the roof of it.
readingMnemonic: When you give your <kanji>best regards</kanji> you always yell <reading>YOLO</reading> (<ja>よろ</ja>) to the other person.
readingInfo: YOLO means "you only live once," so in a way that's a good way to give your best regards. At the very least, it's an interesting way.
